remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用`TimerCallback`指定方法所呼叫的委派。Use a `TimerCallback` delegate to specify the method that is called by a . 這個方法不會建立計時器; 在執行緒中執行它會提供由系統在另一個執行緒集區執行緒中執行。This method does not execute in the thread that created the timer; it executes in a separate thread pool thread that is provided by the system. `TimerCallback`委派叫用方法一次後經過的開始時間，並繼續的時間間隔，直到每一次呼叫呼叫方法時，或直到方法呼叫的間隔值。The `TimerCallback` delegate invokes the method once after the start time elapses, and continues to invoke it once per timer interval until the method is called, or until the method is called with the interval value . > [!NOTE] > 之後，就會發生回呼方法多載呼叫，因為計時器佇列執行緒集區執行緒所執行的回呼。Callbacks can occur after the method overload has been called, because the timer queues callbacks for execution by thread pool threads. 您可以使用方法多載，要等候直到所有的回呼已完成。You can use the method overload to wait until all callbacks have completed. 當計時器建構，而且無法變更，會指定計時器委派。The timer delegate is specified when the timer is constructed, and cannot be changed. 開始時間`Timer`傳入`dueTime`參數`Timer`建構函式，以及句號傳入`period`參數。The start time for a `Timer` is passed in the `dueTime` parameter of the `Timer` constructors, and the period is passed in the `period` parameter. 如需範例，示範如何建立並使用`TimerCallback`委派，請參閱。For an example that demonstrates creating and using a `TimerCallback` delegate, see . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立與使用的委派`Timer`類別。The following code example shows how to create the delegate used with the `Timer` class.
